author: Dara Cothran
title: Beltronics Previews Major Launch
text:
Beltronics Radar ( Beltronics.com ), a premiere category player and innovator of specialty detection protection patents, today announced that they will be making a major news announcement tomorrow, October 14th at 8 AM ET. Beltronics is a category leader and is the innovator of the world’s only true stealth radar detector, the STi Magnum, designed exclusively for the professional driving market.
With a significant share of the top performing products in the radar detector segment, Beltronics is staging a major media campaign set to kick off tomorrow.
For more information on the Beltronics product launch, visit Beltronics.com or, call the company direct at 866.709.8744.
About Beltronics
Beltronics is a major brand under the Escort name, the leading manufacturer of high-performance radar and laser detectors and the patented Escort Live™ real-time ticket protection network. Beltronics manufactures products under the STi, Pro and Vector brands. The company is headquartered in West Chester, Ohio, with its principal manufacturing facility located in Mississauga, Ontario, Canada. Additional information about Escort, Inc. is available at EscortRadar.com.
